name: Weber State University - Firefox 4 scrollbar fix
description: This userstyle will fix the issue with Weber State University's Lynx system not showing scrollbars - specifically on the class registration page.
additional_info:
Version 1.0

It works for me, I came up with this tonight and haven't tested it much.  I was able to register for classes though!
